targets.query: from(bucket: "my-bucket") |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop) |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "power_metrics") |> filter(fn: (r) => r["source"] == "solar_panel") |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "power") |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: r._value / 1000.0 })) |> last()

from(bucket: "my-bucket") |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop) |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "power_metrics") |> filter(fn: (r) => r["source"] == "battery") |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "current") |> last()

from(bucket: "my-bucket") |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop) |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "power_metrics") |> filter(fn: (r) => r["source"] == "battery") |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "voltage") |> last()

import "timezone"
option location = timezone.location(name: "Asia/Seoul")

from(bucket: "my-bucket")
  |> range(start: today(), stop: now())
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "power_metrics" and r["source"] == "solar_panel" and r["_field"] == "power")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: r._value / 1000.0 })) // mW to W
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1m, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> integral(unit: 1h) // W to Wh
  |> last()

from(bucket: "my-bucket") |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop) |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "power_metrics") |> filter(fn: (r) => r["source"] == "solar_panel") |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "power") |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: r._value / 1000.0 })) |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "my-bucket") |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop) |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "power_metrics") |> filter(fn: (r) => r["source"] == "battery") |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "power") |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: r._value / 1000.0 })) |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "my-bucket") |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop) |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "system_status") |> filter(fn: (r) => r["component"] == "tracker") |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "motor_x_angle") |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "my-bucket") |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop) |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "system_status") |> filter(fn: (r) => r["component"] == "tracker") |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "motor_y_angle") |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "my-bucket") |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop) |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "system_status") |> filter(fn: (r) => r["component"] == "light_sensors") |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "up" or r["_field"] == "down" or r["_field"] == "left" or r["_field"] == "right") |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "my-bucket") |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop) |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "system_status") |> filter(fn: (r) => r["component"] == "environment") |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "temperature") |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "my-bucket") |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop) |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "system_status") |> filter(fn: (r) => r["component"] == "controller") |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "cpu_temp") |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "my-bucket") |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop) |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "system_status") |> filter(fn: (r) => r["component"] == "environment") |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "humidity") |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
